text: The Taiwan High Speed Rail Museum () is a museum in Zhongli District, Taoyuan City, Taiwan. ==History== The museum was opened on 5 January 2017 in a ceremony attended by Premier Lin Chuan and Transportation and Communications Minister Hochen Tan. ==Exhibitions== The museum consists of 19 themed exhibitions. ==Transportation== The museum is accessible from Taoyuan Station of Taiwan High Speed Rail. ==See also== * List of museums in Taiwan ==References== Category:2017 establishments in Taiwan Category:Museums established in 2017 Category:Museums in Taoyuan City Category:Railway museums in Taiwan Category:Taiwan High Speed Rail
title: Taiwan High Speed Rail Museum
